    		Free ESL Tutoring
    	English as a Second Language Support Services (ESLS)ESL Support Services (ESLS) offers free online tutoring services for non-native speakers of English who want to improve their English proficiency. We serve international students, bilinguals born in the U.S., and anyone else who identifies as a non-native speaker of English. Please note that this service is only for current CSU, Chico students and staff. We are happy to assist you with:Written assignments at all stages of completionReading comprehensionOral presentationsScholarship/job/graduate school applicationsAny other task that requires proficiency in the English languageWe also provide a space to practice English conversation skills in a fun, informal and low-stakes environment. We will offer in-person tutoring through drop-in visits (no appointments needed!), as well as online tutoring using a variety of platforms (Google doc editing, live Zoom sessions, etc.). For more information and to request ESL tutoring, please ​visit our website.Contact UsSaundra Wright, Coordinatorskwright@csuchico.eduWebsite: https://www.csuchico.edu/engl/resources/esl-resource.shtmlContact us! We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
